original_text: if they give back what they took in pledge for a loan, return what they have stolen, follow the decrees that give life, and do no evil—that person will surely live; they will not die.
korean_text: 저당물을 도로 주며 강탈한 물건을 돌려 보내고 생명의 율례를 지켜 행하여 죄악을 범하지 아니하면 그가 반드시 살고 죽지 아니할지라

sentences.original_text: if they give back what they took in pledge for a loan
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그들이 대출을 위해 잡힌 물건을 돌려준다면

sentences.original_text: follow the decrees that give life
